attributes.action: Allow Concorde and the red arrows to fly at the 2012 olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After seeing concorde go out of action in 2003,I would and many others would love to see it fly in the opening and closing cermony of the 2012 olympics because concorde is something to be proud of and flying with the red arrows would truely represent Great Britain
